alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 3:22PM EDT until March 26 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LOW PRESSURE TO BRING ACCUMULATING SNOW AND SOME SLEET TO THE REGION LATE SATURDAY INTO SUNDAY... .Snow will overspread the advisory area from Saturday afternoon through the evening from west to east. The snow will be heaviest Saturday night and may mix with sleet at times. Much of the accumulating snowfall is expected to be finished Sunday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 8 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow mixed with sleet at times. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches, sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 2 PM Saturday to 8 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
